name: My Habitica fixes
description: Same as Shrink Your Habitica Tasks by Adilendian and mareinna except without shrinking the font or the width of the habit +/- buttons. Replaces font with Avenir Next, defaults to system sans-serif default if that's not available. This version does not collapse checklists. Columns are wider so Rewards drop down below the other three (I rarely use rewards). Added some padding in a couple places, too.
